Title: Reusable MVC Partial View with JQuery Datatables

HomeWiki:
Project Description

Reusable jQuery DataTables integrated with in a Partial View of MVC 4.0 is a reusable control/view written entirely in C# and JQuery, my aim was to create a MVC partial view which renders grid results (Data in table format with sorting and pagination enabled). I needed the control to very flexible/Dynamic so that it renders any number of columns.

I want to thank JQuery DataTable developers (http://www.datatables.net/) for providing a very nice library.

This code is compiled with the Microsoft Framework. NET 4.5 with MVC 4.0 with LINQ and I am using JQuery 2.1.1 and JQuery DataTables 1.10.1 ver (http://cdn.datatables.net/1.10.1/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js)
